item.title: iDrishti on Sarjapur Rd
item.description: Experience Advanced Microincision Cataract Surgeries No Sutures, No Injections Contact us ABOUT IDRISHTI 14 hospitals across Karnataka, 25+ Consultants, Experience of over 50,000 eye surgeries SARJAPUR RD TIMINGS 10 am to 7.30 pm, Mon to Sat. Closed on Sun COVID READY All our staff are vaccinated. Please wear a mask at all times on premisis Our Doctors Dr (Maj) Radha Posterior Segment MBBS, MS, FVR(VITREO-RETINA) Consultant Ophthalmologist and Vitreo Retina Consultant
